node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `registration` ( `from_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `for_registry` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `in_user_profile` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `data` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `comments` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`for_registry`,`from_user`), KEY `registry` (`for_registry`), KEY `user` (`from_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: registration
